entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon. High plus 4 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
